A Pile of Rubbish.name: A Pile of Rubbish
A Pile of Rubbish.abilities: [Augment] When I die, draw a card.

Ancient One.name: Ancient One
Ancient One.abilities: [Augment] I have all abilities of adjacent allies. {/n}{i}(This includes modded abilities.)

Arcane Echo.name: Arcane Echo
Arcane Echo.abilities: [Graft1] Create a copy of target token.

Astralith.name: Astralith
Astralith.abilities: [Augment]  [three]: Put a +1/+1 counter on target unit.

Automaton of Abundance.name: Automaton of Abundance
Automaton of Abundance.abilities: [Augment] If you would create one or more unit tokens, instead create those tokens plus an additional copy of each unique token you created.

Biomass Devourer.name: Biomass Devourer
Biomass Devourer.abilities: [Augment] Whenever a nontoken unit dies, you may pay  [two] to erase it and put two +1/+1 counters on me.

Body Swap.name: Body Swap
Body Swap.abilities: [Graft1] Exchange the base stats of two target units until regroup. {i}(With each other.)

Borrower of Forms.name: Borrower of Forms
Borrower of Forms.abilities: Erase target unit. I become an exact copy of that unit. {i}(I copy all stat changes, counters, card text and mods).

Celestial Fluxmorph.name: Celestial Fluxmorph
Celestial Fluxmorph.abilities: When I spawn or am modded, put a +1/+1 counter on each of your units. {/n}[Augment] When I despawn, remove all counters from your units.

Celestial Shifter.name: Celestial Shifter
Celestial Shifter.abilities: [Augment]  [x]: I become base X/X until regroup.

Containment Protocol.name: Containment Protocol
Containment Protocol.abilities: Negate all activated and triggered effects.

Cosmic Conspirator.name: Cosmic Conspirator
Cosmic Conspirator.abilities: If you would create a Robot, Poison, Crystal or Fireball, you may instead create a token of any of these types. {i}(With the same X value.)

Deformant.name: Deformant
Deformant.abilities: Sacrifice me and another ally: Delete all units with cost equal to the total number of counters on us.

Discharge.name: Discharge
Discharge.abilities: [Graft1] /[Remove X +1/+1 counters from allies]: I deal X damage to target unit.

Dispatch Courier.name: Dispatch Courier
Dispatch Courier.abilities: [Augment] Each turn, you may play a unit during the haste step as if it had  [Haste].

Download.name: Download
Download.abilities: Gain control of target token. You may choose new targets for spells controlled this way.

Eldritch Dreamtender.name: Eldritch Dreamtender
Eldritch Dreamtender.abilities: [Augment] When my column deals combat damage to an opponent, sacrifice me. If you do, look at that player's hand and discard a card from it.

Evolutionary Experiment.name: Evolutionary Experiment
Evolutionary Experiment.abilities: [Augment] Whenever I am modded or applied as a mod, put two +1/+1 counters on me.

Flux Constructor.name: Flux Constructor
Flux Constructor.abilities: [Augment] Whenever one of your units with one or more counters on it dies, you may put those counters onto another target unit.

Flux Resonator.name: Flux Resonator
Flux Resonator.abilities: [Augment] If one or more counters would be put on a unit by an allied source, put that many counters plus one instead.

Foretell.name: Foretell
Foretell.abilities: [Graft1] Glimpse 1 {i}(Reveal the top card of the deck {/n}and cache it. Until end of turn, you may play it {/n}as if it was in your hand, ignoring affinity.)

Formless.name: Formless
Formless.abilities: When I attack or block,  [Graft] Target unit be- {/n}comes a base 4/4 and loses all attributes until regroup. {i}(This removes attributes from its column.)

Hooba-Bot.name: Hooba-Bot
Hooba-Bot.abilities: [Augment] When I attack or block, create a Robot 2 in my formation.

Instrument of Reassignment.name: Instrument of Reassignment
Instrument of Reassignment.abilities: [Augment]  [x], Sacrifice another nontoken unit: Create a Robot X. X can't be 0.

Interdiction Rift.name: Interdiction Rift
Interdiction Rift.abilities: Target opponent negates an effect they control.

Invasive Reassignment.name: Invasive Reassignment
Invasive Reassignment.abilities: Switch the power and defense of target unit until regroup.

Linked Extinction.name: Linked Extinction
Linked Extinction.abilities: [Graft1] /[Sacrifce a unit]: Each opponent sacrifices a unit.

Manufacture.name: Manufacture
Manufacture.abilities: [Graft1] Create a Robot 3, a Robot 2 and a Robot 1.

Monke.name: Monke
Monke.abilities: If I spawned this turn, other units lose all attributes and abilities during battle.

Perish.name: Perish
Perish.abilities: Each player sacrifices half of their units, rounded up.

Powerforge Synergist.name: Powerforge Synergist
Powerforge Synergist.abilities: I spawn with two +1/+1 counters. {/n} [Augment] When I despawn, you may move my counters onto target unit.

Recyclable Sentinel.name: Recyclable Sentinel
Recyclable Sentinel.abilities: When I spawn or die, [Graft1] Create a Robot 1.

Reforge the Dead.name: Reforge the Dead
Reforge the Dead.abilities: Your units gain "When I die, create a Robot 3." until regroup.

Refuse Reclaimer.name: Refuse Reclaimer
Refuse Reclaimer.abilities: [Augment] Whenever another unit dies, put a +1/+1 counter on me.

Riftwalker.name: Riftwalker
Riftwalker.abilities: [Augment][once]  [one]: Switch my position with another target ally in my formation.

Scavenging Sentry.name: Scavenging Sentry
Scavenging Sentry.abilities: [Augment] Sacrifice another unit: Put a +1/+1 counter on me.

Scrap For Parts.name: Scrap For Parts
Scrap For Parts.abilities: [Graft] Move all counters from target unit onto another target unit.

Self-Assembly.name: Self-Assembly
Self-Assembly.abilities: [Graft1] Create a Robot X, where X is your  [m].

Soul Reaver.name: Soul Reaver
Soul Reaver.abilities: [Augment]  [one], Remove X +1/+1 counters from me: I deal X damage to target unit.

Suppression Field.name: Suppression Field
Suppression Field.abilities: Target unit loses all attributes and abilities until regroup. Erase all of its mods and negate all of its effects.

Synaptic Energizer.name: Synaptic Energizer
Synaptic Energizer.abilities: After combat, [Graft1] Put a +1/+1 counter on each of your units.

Technological Superiority.name: Technological Superiority
Technological Superiority.abilities: [Graft1] Duplicate each counter on target unit.

Transmogrifant.name: Transmogrifant
Transmogrifant.abilities: [Augment] Your other units gain +2/+2 and lose all attributes and abilities.

Unmake.name: Unmake
Unmake.abilities: Delete target unit with base power 2 or less.

Unstable Refactor.name: Unstable Refactor
Unstable Refactor.abilities: Target unit becomes base 5/0 until regroup.

Unstable Singularity.name: Unstable Singularity
Unstable Singularity.abilities: When I die, [Graft1] Delete target unit.

Void Memory.name: Void Memory
Void Memory.abilities: [Graft1] Each opponent discards a /[unit {i1}or spell] if {/n}able. Otherwise, they reveal their hand.

Worldbender.name: Worldbender
Worldbender.abilities: Skip your draft step. When you do, draw a card. You also lose 3 life if playing a constructed format.
